tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had visited Dr Abhishek Chauhan for Hair transplant. Hair Transplant surgery was done at an unbelievably reasonable cost which I couldn't find anywhere else in Mumbai. 
Hospitality provided by Dr and his team was remarkable.Special attention was given by Dr to explain me the entire procedure and he is very soft spoken in nature. you can approach Dr Abhishek very easily and he will even reply your messages whenever he finds time from his schedule. Surgery was absolutely painless. Would recommend for hair transplant.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,

Since its a long procedure the hospitality provided by Dr and his team was great.Special attention was given by Dr to explain me the entire procedure .Hair Transplant surgery was done at an unbelievably reasonable cost which I couldn't find anywhere else in Mumbai. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******** ******* ** ****** ************** ** ****** ***** *********** ** *** ******** . In the guise of reasonable treatment, he will make you undergo 8 hr of surgery and does not perform treatment per his commitment. I incurred an expense of 90k **** ********** ******* ******* ****** . Followed all the guidance and precaution *** ** ******* I underwent 8hrs of surgery with more than 10k needle shots *** **** ** ******* ******* **** ******* ** ***** ******** ****** *** ******** ** ******. I followed up by traveling 3 hours to reach his hospital and doctor along with his wife fought with me. ******** ***** ****** ** ************* ************** *** *********** Your money will be wasted if you see Dr. Abhishek Chauhan for hair transplant. Please save urself!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had pain in My jaw, because of pain there is always pain near my ear and headache 3/4 days in a week, and I was taking pain killers from last 2 years. Dr Uday has recommended me to Dr Abhishek Chauhan. Now I haven’t pain in my jaw since 1 month after treatment. Thank you Dr Abhishek.
reply_text: Thank u Mr.shailesh for your valuable feedback

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am a doctor n i fear pain . I have undergone root canal even before elsewhere but it was quite painfull .. the root canal with dr abhishek was painless ..thanks for the painless treatment and i believe u have 'magic' in your hand . 
Tc 
Dr vyshnavi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My son Aryadutt, milk tooth was broken due to accident while playing, Dr. Abhishek diagnosed it and explained me about the bone structure growth jaw growth till the age of 12, also assured that don't need to worry as of now, at the age of 12 we can take a call if any care or precaution is needed for the growth of tooth naturally with its alignment with other teeths. I am really satisfied n happy the way their team works.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had consulted dr Abhishek for  an implant supported Denture case for my mother who is 70 years old. Doctor Abhishek and his team were very efficient and the entire ecosystem at Sharan hospital is very well designed to efficiently cater to patients. He was very patient with all our naive queries, was very knowledgeable and guided us with great care right from choosing the right denture to getting the implant in place. He would stretch beyond his consulting hours to personally tweak the denture and ensuring my mother tried it multiple times until she was completely satisfied with the fit. He showed great care and love as he dealt with this elderly patient. My mother was very happy with his behaviour and care . I would highly recommend consulting Dr Abhishek. *** ** *** **** ******** * **** *** ** ******************

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Me and My wife having fear while going fr treatment DENTAL pain . My wife had undergone root canal even before elsewhere but it was quite painfull .. the root canal with Dr Abhishek was painless ..thanks for the painless treatment and i believe you have 'magic' in your hand. After few days my had IMPLANT of tooth and went very well without pain. Hats off to doctor at with very reasonable cost compare to other. Excellent service, ******* ********* and Excellent Human being. God bbless dear Dr. Abhishek jee Chauhan.

tags: None
review: I had terrible pain with my right side wisdom tooth..and it being a Sunday local doctors were not available..I got dr.abhisheks number from Practo..he immediately responded to my call and took me up for surgery..the surgery was painless and I was releaved of my pain within an hour..also the staff there is very cooperative and caring..thank u dr.abhishek

tags: None
review: I had visited Dr.Abhishek  for my mothers old ill fitting dentures..he suggested to go for the new implant supported lower denture..I was worried about the procedure as my mother is diabetic too..but Dr.Abhishek took special attention to explain the procedure and performed it at the highest level of sterilization..Thanks to him my mother has a confident smile and no fear and discomfort of loose dentures..
